person.persName: John Fowler Leavy (Frankfort atto & postal agent)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and postal agent. Lexington, Kentucky, native. Attended Transylvania University in 1830. Married Margaret Trotter Leavy. Delegate from Franklin County, Kentucky, to the Friends of Emancipation in Kentucky convention in Frankfort in 1849. Attorney in Franklin County in 1850. Owned six enslaved people in Franklin County in 1850. Appointed Special Agent of the Post Office in 1851. Defaulted as special mail agent in 1853.
